00031 class DTimer{

00053   
00054 private:
00055   double startTime; // time of most recent of: creation, start, or resume
00056   double accumulatedTime; // total time accumulated (not including the current
00057                           // amount of time since most recent start/resume if
00058                           // not currently stopped)
00059   bool fStopped;
00060 };

00063 #ifdef _WIN32
00064 #include <windows.h> // for timeGetTime() function and Sleep() function
00065 inline double DTimer::getNow(){
00066   return ((double)timeGetTime()) / 1000.;
00067 }
00068 #else
00069 inline double DTimer::getNow(){
00070   struct timeval tv;
00071 
00072   if(0 != gettimeofday(&tv, NULL)){
00073 #ifdef DEBUG
00074     fprintf(stderr, "DTimer::getNow() gettimeofday failed\n");
00075 #endif
00076   }
00077   return ( (double)(tv.tv_sec) + tv.tv_usec * 1.0E-6);
00078 }
00079 #endif
00080 
00081 inline void DTimer::start(){
00082   this->start(DTimer::getNow());
00083 }
00084 
00085 inline void DTimer::start(double stimeSecs){
00086   fStopped = false;
00087   accumulatedTime = 0.;
00088   startTime = stimeSecs;
00089 }
00090 
00091 inline void DTimer::stop(){
00092   this->stop(DTimer::getNow());
00093 }
00094 
00095 inline void DTimer::stop(double stimeSecs){
00096 #ifdef DEBUG
00097   if(fStopped)
00098     fprintf(stderr,"DTimer::stop() called while timer not running\n");
00099 #endif
00100   if(!fStopped){
00101     accumulatedTime += stimeSecs - startTime;
00102     fStopped = true;
00103   }
00104 }
00105 
00106 inline void DTimer::resume(){
00107   this->resume(DTimer::getNow());
00108 }
00109 
00110 inline void DTimer::resume(double stimeSecs){
00111 #ifdef DEBUG
00112   if(!fStopped)
00113     fprintf(stderr,"DTimer::resume() called while timer running\n");
00114 #endif
00115   fStopped = false;
00116   startTime = stimeSecs;
00117 }
00118 inline double DTimer::getAccumulated(){
00119   if(!fStopped)
00120     return (accumulatedTime + getSplit());
00121   return accumulatedTime;
00122 }
00123 inline double DTimer::getSplit(){
00124   return (getNow() - startTime);
00125 }
00126 
00127 #endif
